TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AzureBlobTranscriptStore extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Core.Extensions.ITranscriptLogger, class Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Core.Extensions.ITranscriptStore

Docs.summary: The blob transcript store stores transcripts in an Azure Blob container.
Docs.remarks: Each activity is stored as json blob in structure of container/{channelId]/{conversationId}/{Timestamp.ticks}-{activity.id}.json
